definitions.text: alter or regulate so as to achieve accuracy or conform to a standard
examples: correct the alignment of the front wheels

definitions.text: place in a line or arrange so as to be parallel or straight
examples: align the car with the curb
align the sheets of paper on the table

definitions.text: adapt or conform oneself to new or different conditions
examples: We must adjust to the bad economic situation
Adjust your eyes to the darkness

definitions.text: decide how much is to be paid on an insurance claim
